meanings.definition: The action of joining two surfaces together to form a ridge.
meanings.sent1: The ridging of the puzzle pieces made it easier to connect them.
meanings.sent2: The ridging of the wood panels ensured a tight fit when assembled.
meanings.sent3: The ridging of the Lego blocks allowed them to interlock securely.
meanings.sent4: The ridging of the pipes prevented leaks in the plumbing system.
meanings.sent5: The ridging of the gears improved the efficiency of the machine.
